overview:
Lifa Bekwa; (born August 05, 1989, Pietermaritzburg, Republic of South Africa) is a South African businessman, designer and inventor., founder of IKlikit Corporation, which created IKlikit Journal, a personal photo and video journal and manufacture the Flip Page wireless handheld devices.

Lifa Bekwa attended different colleges but he did not complete his degree. In the year 2006, Lifa Bekwa and a childhood friend Njabulo Sokhela designed and engineer a moment sharing space site. The IKlikit Journal, with a belief that all photos and videos are meaningful. They’re snapshots and snippets of moments that makes one smile and represent memories that one would want to remember. Together Lifa Bekwa and Njabulo Sokhela worked on their Journal and later Lifa and Njabulo split up and Lifa was left alone with the dream which led to the creation of the Pager mobile and, months later, the Flip Page mobile devices.
